item.title: Bernie knows when to swipe right
item.description:
Bernie knows when to swipe right

Meet Bernie. He talks. He swipes. He does research. Bernie is your personal matchmaking and dating assistant A.I.

item.title: Google's Go Victory Is Just a Glimpse of How Powerful AI Will Be
item.description:
Google's Go Victory Is Just a Glimpse of How Powerful AI Will Be

An artificially intelligent Google machine just beat a human grandmaster at the game of Go, the 2,500-year-old contest of strategy and intellect that's exponentially more complex than the game of chess. And Nick Bostrom isn't exactly impressed.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
Artificial Intelligence

Should we be scared of artificial intelligence and all it will bring us? Not so long as we remember to make sure to build artificial emotional intelligence into the technology.

item.title: Stephen Hawking warns artificial intelligence could end mankind - BBC News
item.description:
Stephen Hawking warns artificial intelligence could end mankind - BBC News

Prof Stephen Hawking, one of Britain's pre-eminent scientists, has said that efforts to create thinking machines pose a threat to our very existence. He told the BBC:"The development of full artificial intelligence could spell the end of the human race."

item.title: Robots and AI Invade Banking
item.description:
Robots and AI Invade Banking

No longer just the objects of fascination in science fiction, robots are beginning their invasion of banking. Robots and artificial intelligence in banking have the potential to reduce costs, expand skills, and improve the customer experience working alongside (or replacing) humans.
